programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Psycho Fear Factor Episode 1" - Six couples compete in a variety of stunts while living together in the Bates Motel.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Psycho Fear Factor Episode 2" - Contestants must live together and compete in and around the "Psycho" house and the Bates Motel.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Psycho Fear Factor Episode 3" - Couples in straitjackets must eat live camel-spiders, and a home invasion in Dallas.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Family Fear Factor - Universal Orlando" - A parent must jump out of a helicopter 200 feet in the air, while the offspring goes down a 100-foot-long zipline, and a test of the contestants' acrobatic skills.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Blind Date Fear Factor" - Contestants pair up with complete strangers to manoeuvre a speeding boat beneath a helicopter and escape a small cage submerged in freezing water.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Old Vs Young Fear Factor" - Two 20-something teams take on two couples more than twice their age in a tug-of-war 100 feet in the air and a competition to drive a car onto a flatbed truck as it barrels down the highway.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Disaster Fear Factor" - With challenges such as facing hurricane-force rain and wind at 100 feet in the air, eating cockroaches, and battling a flash flood.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Crane Cannon Launch/Trash Scavenger Hunt/Heli Body Drag" - This episode featured four pairs as teams. First, it's the human cannonball. As a truck drives along a pier with a crane hanging off the side, one team member hangs from a crane and then into the water they light the fuse to giant cannon. Their partner is shot out of the cannon and into the water, swim to a boat and clip a flag to a flagpole. The team to finish fastest chooses team to be eliminated. Next, it's a trash can buffet scavenger hunt. Teams dig through dumpsters and barrels to find items. The team to match four items fastest would win a four-day trip to Las Vegas and $20,000. No one would be eliminated. The final stunt is a real drag. Team members hanging on to handlebars attached to a helicopter and are dragged across pavement on their stomachs. They have to let go as close to the finish line as possible. The team to get the least combined distance from the finish line would win $50K. The home invasion stunt goes to Dubuque, Iowa.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Ex Factor" - Feuding and former couples try to capture scorpions and navigate a high-speed obstacle-course.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Mother/Son Fear Factor" - Mothers must balance on their son's shoulders while on a ledge 100 feet in the air the teams navigate through a kitchen filled with obstacles.

programme.title: This Land Is Your Land
programme.desc: With the Ranchers trapped and without hope, Alicia is thrust into a position of leadership where she's forced to make life-changing decisions.

programme.title: El Matadero
programme.desc: Alicia encounters a potential ally. Ofelia fights for survival, while Nick uses his skillset for profit in the apocalypse.

programme.title: Things Bad Begun
programme.desc: Strand's motives are made clear when Nick discovers a new threat descending on the dam. Madison faces a horrifying revelation.

programme.title: Clear
programme.desc: Realizing they are heavily outgunned against the Governor's forces, Rick leads an expedition to get more weapons.

programme.title: Arrow on the Doorpost
programme.desc: In an effort to prevent any more deaths, Rick and the Governor meet to come up with a peace treaty.

programme.title: Prey
programme.desc: The Governor chases a dissenter who fled Woodbury. While the Governor is gone, a traitor tries to sabotage his upcoming plans.

programme.title: Clear
programme.desc: Realizing they are heavily outgunned against the Governor's forces, Rick leads an expedition to get more weapons.

programme.title: Arrow on the Doorpost
programme.desc: In an effort to prevent any more deaths, Rick and the Governor meet to come up with a peace treaty.

programme.title: Prey
programme.desc: The Governor chases a dissenter who fled Woodbury. While the Governor is gone, a traitor tries to sabotage his upcoming plans.

programme.title: Trolland
programme.desc: Fenn the Troll hates the Troll pastime of pranking, and is teased so much for it that he runs away. But when a long-suffering park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his family and friends - without pranking.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: 40 Days and Nights
programme.desc: When a colossal tectonic shift causes the sea level to start rising, a microbiologist gathers the DNA of as many species as she can, while the military creates an "ark" in a desperate attempt to preserve life on Earth.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: CarGo
programme.desc: A young car learns the importance of family when he embarks on a mission to rescue his father - who's been sent to Clunker Island to be repurposed as junk metal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A lifelong resident of the tiny town of Lefroy, Tasmania was murdered outside his own home. Robbery appeared to be the motive, but with no suspects, the investigation came to a halt.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1997, Kelly Eckart's car was found, with her belongings still in it, after she worked a late shift in Franklin, Indiana. Days later, her body was found in an isolated ravine.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Derrick Duehren returned to find his Oregon home burned to the ground. His wife's charred remains were later found in the rubble.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A millionaire and his family were executed in their own home. For three years, the murders went unsolved. Finally, a box of ammunition and some fluorescent fibers revealed the ultimate betrayal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young girl was found dead, police quickly arrested the most likely suspect. But cutting-edge technology from NASA enabled a forensic odontologist to prove the wrong man was behind bars.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It's usually easy to determine how a criminal entered the crime scene. But in this case, it was far from clear. It looked like the killer vanished into thin air...and perhaps he had.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young fireman died from what appeared to be serious but undiagnosed heart disease, his family and friends were devastated but they had no proof of foul play.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Security cameras in a casino tracked a young woman's movements until shortly before she disappeared. She was never seen again.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a dedicated, well-respected teacher disappeared, police had to determine if she'd gone on vacation without telling anyone, or if she was the victim of foul play.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Seattle police had no suspects in the violent murder of post-grunge singer, Mia Zapata. More than a decade passed before the evidence could be used by forensic scientists to identify the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Michigan State University grad student disappeared and was presumed dead. With the help of a professor of geological sciences, police hoped to get the "dirt" on her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: How unlucky could one man be? His wife took her own life and his college sweetheart killed herself in much the same fashion fourteen years earlier.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, 54-year-old Gayle Isleib was ambushed in her Manchester, Connecticut driveway and shot to death. Now police must determine if love had turned into obsession... and a motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl went missing from her Colorado home and the only evidence the kidnapper left behind was three fingerprints on a window screen.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A brutal murder, lots of suspects and conflicting evidence but the forensics were clear on one thing: The killer knew his victim. And that alone gave investigators a head start.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A serial killer was on the loose and police had to find him before he struck again. Their most promising lead was an unusual one: a bloody fingerprint on the body of one of the victims.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On Halloween night 2004, Adriane Insogna and Leslie Mazzara were brutally murdered in their Napa, California home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After the suspect was convicted of arson and murder, he maintained his innocence but was sentenced to 25 years in prison.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Finale Part 1" - Weak and weary from their journey, the few designers left say goodbye to NYC and return to their respective hometowns to begin working on their final collections. Tim Gunn travels to visit the designers and assess their progress. In the end, all four remaining designers must present their three best pieces to the judging panel, as the judges are left to decide who will move on to show at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Finale Part 2" - It's the moment of truth for the remaining designers as they each present their final collections to an eager audience at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week. One designer is named the winner of Project Runway Season 10, and the rest are unfortunately out.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: ''And Sew It Begins'' - Heidi and Tim greet 17 new designers—the most in series history—and break the news that the final audition is still to come. The designers are challenged to create a garment from clothes from another designer's luggage in only five hours. The pressure is on as the designers must work against the clock to wow Heidi, Michael, Nina, and guest judge Selma Blair.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: ''Larger Than Life'' - The designers meet Joanna Coles, Editor in Chief of Marie Claire magazine, for their biggest challenge yet. They are told that they are to create designs that epitomize the Marie Claire woman. The winning look will be displayed on a 50-foot billboard in NYC. Joanna guest judges.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: ''It's a Party'' - It's anything but party time when the designers get their Unconventional Materials Challenge: to make chic looks out of party supplies. But when the designers' models walk through the doors, the designers learn that there is a catch that may push them to their limits. The "Queen of Unconventional Fashion," Betsey Johnson, guest judges.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: ''Hats Off to You'' - The designers are left scratching their heads when faced with Project Runway's first hat-inspired challenge. They must design garments influenced by the outrageous hats of famed British milliner Philip Treacy, who also guest judges.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: ''There IS an "I" in Team'' - The designers get their first taste of a Team Challenge when they are split into two teams and tasked with creating a cohesive line to match the hair trends for 2010. Georgina Chapman and Heather Kerzner guest judge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: ''You Can Totally Wear That Again'' - The designers select real former bridesmaids and prove that their dresses can be worn again after redesigning the looks. But will they be able to handle the pressure when they have to present their work to the public? Designer Cynthia Rowley guest judges.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: ''What's Mine is Yours'' - Project Runway sets sail when the designers get a resort wear challenge from Michael Kors. But when they discover who is actually creating their visions, some designers may want to walk the plank! Actress Kristen Bell guest judges.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: ''A Rough Day on the Runway'' - The designers get a lesson on fashionable politics when they learn about the creation and longevity of American sportswear. Actress January Jones guest judges.

programme.title: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai
programme.desc: Neurosurgeon. Physicist. Rock Star. With the help of his unique team, Buckaroo Banzai (Peter Weller) is ready to save the world on a moment's notice. But after his successful test of the Oscillation Overthruster, the evil Red Lectroids are unleashed from the 8th dimension. Led by Lord John Whorfin (John Lithgow), the Lectroids steal the Overthruster. But no matter where you go, there Buckaroo Banzai is...ready to battle an interdimensional menace that could spell doom for the entire human race.

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: In 2022, Earth is struck by a comet, leading to a massive drought. 11 years later a majority of the water left is kept in a reserve. Tank Girl (Lori Petty) is a member of a resistance group who steals whatever they want, by any means necessary. Being the enemies of the water reserve, their hideout is attacked, Tank Girl's boyfriend is killed and her friend Sam (Stacy Linn Ramsower) is captured! Now Tank Girl and her cohorts must break mega-villain Kesslee's (Malcolm McDowell) grip on the world.

Now an outcast, he receives little help from his embittered fellow officers when he's hurled into a blistering battle against rival drug kingpins. But Cusack is a one-man army, waging war on the criminals with his razor-sharp wits, lightning-fast karate moves and a remote-controlled, rocket-equipped tank!

Thom Hunt meets a man who claims to have a skull capable of withstanding extreme forces Li Xin demonstrates this by performing a headstand on the tip of a nine-inch nail. Will MRI show the key to his skull strength?
Thom continues his quest to meet Biba Struger, who claims to be immune to electrocution. Using electrical wires plugged into an electrical socket, Biba uses his body to complete the circuit. programme.title: Central America

programme.title: Plastic: The Real Sea Monster
programme.desc: Millions of tons of plastic enter the ocean every year, from rivers and shores, ships and platforms. The world’s scientists have studied the phenomenon and have come to alarming conclusions. Unlike other refuse, plastic stays in the water without breaking down. It becomes trapped in vast whirlpools of garbage called gyres. How is this deadly killer affecting the world’s oceans, and humanity?

programme.title: In the Land of Gorillas
programme.desc: Travel deep into the forest of Gabon, in the footsteps of gorillas. Meet primatologist Juan Salvador and share his passion for the great apes as he reveals his latest discoveries about lowland gorillas in their natural habitat.

programme.title: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: Life emerged three and a half billion years ago, and since then has evolved into a dazzling variety of shapes and forms. Species that are best adapted to their environment survive. Humans are playing a huge part in this development, turning grasslands and forests into fields and cities, and polluting the air and water. What is happening to evolution? The answer is very simple: us.

programme.title: The Banks
programme.desc: Traffic on the Nile is building, signaling Bettany’s arrival into Luxor. The crew takes a well-earned break whilst Bettany heads to the west bank to see where generations of skilled royal tomb-builders lived. Bettany also takes in the modern night life and the giant Karnak Temple before returning to the river in time to cross paths with the oldest steam ship on the Nile.

programme.title: The River
programme.desc: A hundred miles south of Cairo, Bettany starts on a stretch of Nile that few visitors ever get to see. Once Egypt’s main highway, this was where Cleopatra herself used to travel and be seen by her people. Further upriver, Bettany tracks down Egypt’s lost emblem, the blue lotus flower, and visits the beautiful tombs where Tutankhamen’s discoverer Howard Carter first got hooked on Egypt.

programme.title: The Mouth
programme.desc: Bettany visits Egypt’s gateway to the world, the Nile’s mouth, before boarding her fabulous ‘dahabiya’ and meeting the crew that will guide her upriver the entire length of Egypt. Sailing south of Cairo, there’s time for Bettany to learn a few ropes onboard before she braves the underground tunnels of a collapsed pyramid, where the earliest known hieroglyphic writing can be found.

programme.title: Allen Iverson Reminds Us Why He's The Best Dressed NBA Player Ever | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: On this week's episode of "Tunnel Takedown," we're live from ComplexCon 2019 in Long Beach with special guest and NBA style legend Allen Iverson! In addition to discussing which NBA players were the best and worst dressed of the week, we take a look at some of A.I's past fits while in the league and discuss the influence he still has on current player's fashion. Iverson also tells stories about the backlash he received for not sticking to the NBA's former uniform dress code, plus more!

programme.title: James Harden's Cozy Fit Costs as Much as a New Car | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: On this episode of 'Tunnel Takedown,' the hosts talk PJ Tucker's latest outfit, how players tone down their fits in smaller cities, the '90s Starter jacket trend still being in style today, and Racks Hogan explains his beef with Amiri. They even try to guess the costs of outfits from superstars like James Harden and Ben Simmons. The numbers may surprise you.

programme.title: NikeStories vs Nick Engvall in a Sneaker Battle From Home! | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this episode of Sneaker Battle From Home, we put two OG's in the sneaker space against one another. In one corner we have Drew Hammell, also known as NikeStories, and in the other corner we have founder of "Sneaker History" and veteran writer in the sneaker blog space, Nick Engvall. These two go head to head in a versatile five round battle! We get to see some classic gems, we haven't seen in a while. Check it out for yourselves and let us know who won this battle!

programme.title: Josh Luber of StockX vs Charlotte Hornets Bismack Biyombo in a Sneaker Battle | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: (Episode shot on 5/26/2020) On this episode of #LIFEATCOMPLEX Presents Sneaker Battle, we have a "David vs Goliath" battle! In one corner he is the co-founder of one of the largest online sneaker marketplaces in the world, StockX's very own Josh Luber is here to battle! And in the other corner, he is the biggest competitor we've had so far, literally! Standing in at 6 foot 8 inches tall, center for the Charlotte Hornets, Bismak Biyombo is here to throw down in the sneaker gauntlet!

programme.title: NBA Champion Matt Barnes Reveals His Worst Dressed Teammate | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: Welcome back to the premiere episode of "Tunnel Takedown" season 2 hosted by Racks Hogan Complex's vet stylist stoner, Matt Barnes 14-year NBA tunnel vet, NBA champion and hooping stoner and Gia Seo Creative Director and sockfluencer as they break down the best and worst fits from some of your favorite NBA players walking the tunnel.

programme.title: Kelly Oubre Channels His Rockstar Energy while Chris Paul's Fit Flops | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: This week's episode of "Tunnel Takedown" discusses players like PJ Tucker experimenting with patterns and new brands, Kelly Oubre's latest rockstar fit, overalls having a comeback thanks to players like Russell Westbrook, and the problem with wearing too many graphics at once. Our host Matt Barnes even takes a look at some fits from his playing days.

programme.title: Joe La Puma Breaks Down How To Pair Sneakers with Your Fits | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: Joe La Puma joins the panel this week for the season two finale to discuss how to find the perfect pair of sneakers to pair with your outfit. The hosts also crown their best dressed players of the season so far, and discuss the personal styles of NBA superstars like LeBron James and Giannis Antetokounmpo. Racks Hogan, NBA champion Matt Barnes, and Creative Director Gia Seo also give their picks for the worst tunnel outfits of the year thus far.

programme.title: Marcus Jordan Says New Air Jordan Project Is On The Way | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: Son of NBA legend Michael Jordan, Marcus, stops by this week on 'Tunnel Takedown.' He teases an upcoming Air Jordan project with his store Trophy Room coming in 2020, and gives his thoughts on the latest fits from stars like Kemba Walker and PJ Tucker. Host Racks Hogan, NBA champion Matt Barnes, and Creative Director Gia Seo also discuss Carmelo Anthony's style to celebrate his recent return to the NBA and roast some more of the league's most flagrant fits.

programme.title: Racks Loses It Over Russell Westbrook and JaVale McGee Needs a Shirt | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: This week, Racks Hogan, Mouse Jones and Kalysse Anthony break down their favorite looks of the week and get into a heated discussion over Russell Westbrook. Plus, renowned stylist Derek Roche previews the upcoming style trend while on the set of French Montana's new video. Then, Kalysse walks us through the do's and don'ts of Dopp kits and the hosts go in on JaVale McGee's bold fit.

programme.title: TMarkGotKickss Vs WhoisHeck In A Sneaker Battle From Home | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this episode of #LIFEATCOMPLEX Presents Sneaker Battle, we are putting two acquaintances against one another. In one corner we have the Chief Operating Officer of PrivateLabelNYC, Hector Aponte, taking on the outfit grid king, Terrel Marcus aka TMarkGotKickss! Both battlers displayed a wide variety of hyped and exclusive sneakers you won't see often! Check out the episode and let us know who won this battle?!

programme.title: Kyle Kuzma Shows Up in Supreme and PJ Tucker Keeps It Comfy | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: This week, hosts Racks Hogan, Kalysse Anthony and Mouse Jones get into it over PJ Tucker's satin Dolce & Gabbana outfit, and break down Kevin Durant and Kyle Kuzma's pre-game fits. Then, celebrity stylist Derek Roche shows us how to put looks together for a tall, athletic basketball player. Plus, the hosts go head-to-head in a game of Guess Who, and celebrate the legacies of Dwyane Wade and Dirk Nowitzki.

programme.title: Detroit Pistons Langston Galloway vs Nike SB Collector in a Sneaker Battle From Home!
programme.desc: On this episode we have NBA player and sneaker collector, Langston Galloway, from the Detroit Pistons going up against Complex's "Best Kept Secret" Kevin Luyster in an epic Sneaker Battle From Home! Both came equipped with a variety of sneakers in an all out 5 round battle! You won't get any spoilers here, watch the episode and decide for yourself on who won this battle!

programme.title: Qias Omar vs HesKicks In A Sneaker Battle From Home! | #LIFEATCOMPLEX

They both started their respective channels back in 2012, Heskicks vs Qias Omar, is a battle of old school collecting versus new school hype! The two put on a display of versatility for the public in an incredible 5 round battle! Make sure you watch and debate for yourself on who won this battle!

programme.title: Lavar Ball vs Jacques Slade In A Sneaker Battle From Home | #LIFEATCOMPLEX

In one corner, he is an OG to the Sneaker Youtube space, some would consider him the Godfather of sneaker unboxing videos, @Jacques Slade aka Kustoo is here to battle! His opponent is the undefeated one, this man NEVER LOST a single competition of any sort in his life, Lavar Ball is here to battle! Watch the battle and let us know who won this matchup!

programme.title: Watch King Combs Choose Between Drake & Pusha T for Best Rapper of the Decade | Complex Brackets
programme.desc: Complex Brackets is a new game show from Complex News where your favorite celebs choose the best rapper in any one of these four categories: Best East Coast Rapper, Best West Coast Rapper, Best Rapper of the Decade, and Best Rapper of All Time. In this episode, King Combs hits a wall when he has to choose between Drake and Pusha T for the crown of Best Rapper of the Decade. Be sure to check out Complex Brackets every Monday at 2:00pm EST right here on Complex News.

programme.title: Moneybagg Yo Crowns The Best Rapper of the Decade | Complex Brackets
programme.desc: The Dirty South dominates throughout this episode when Moneybagg Yo sticks to his roots as he goes through our Best Rapper of the Decade bracket. The Memphis rapper delivered upset after upset while being faced with tough choices between hip hop giants and rappers who spoke to his life growing up. Make sure you share your choices in the comments below. Would you have picked the same?

programme.title: James Harden Rocks Louis Vuitton and Chris Paul Reps Black-Owned Brands | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: On the latest "Tunnel Takedown," hosts Kalysse Anthony, Mouse Jones and Racks Hogan can't agree on Russell Westbrook's latest look and break down why James Harden's Louis Vuitton outfit missed the mark. Then, we shout out Chris Paul for his support of black designers, and Racks explains how to tell the difference between an original vintage t-shirt and a reproduction.

programme.title: The Perfect New York Slice with Frank Pinello and Michael Imperioli | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: In New York City, pizza isn't just food, it's a way of life. But which iconic NY-style dish reigns supreme: the Sicilian square or the classic round pie? In the series premiere of Pizza Wars, host Nicole Russell faces off against Best Pizza's Frank Pinello to find out which slice is the true king of New York. And who better to judge the event than legendary actor and pizza obsessive Michael Imperioli?

programme.title: Binging with Babish Judges Movie-Inspired Pizzas: Nicole Russell vs Mike Greenfield | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Which movie-inspired pizza reigns supreme: the broccoli-topped pie from Inside Out, or "pizza in a cup" from The Jerk? As host Nicole Russell continues her quest to become the world's next master pizza-maker, Binging with Babish has challenged her and Pro Home Cooks' Mike Greenfield to take his silver-screen recreations to the next level. Will Nicole's Cup O' Pizza earn her a much-needed victory following a tough loss to Frank Pinello in Episode 1?

programme.title: The Ultimate Viral Pizza Showdown with Mike Hauke, Mark Iacono, and Scott Wiener | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Ramen, tacos, cheeseburgers, fried chicken-Mike Hauke of Tony Boloney's can turn just about anything into a pizza. But has the undisputed king of Instagramable pies finally met his match? In a brand new episode of Pizza Wars, host Nicole Russell attempts to wrestle the crown from Dr. Franken-slice in a viral pizza showdown for the ages. Will Nicole's popcorn-crusted bar pie be enough to topple Mike's bone-in "Flaming Cowboy"? Only pizza pros Mark Iacono and Scott Wiener can decide.

programme.title: Sean Evans and Farideh Sadeghin Taste Test Chicago Deep Dish Made by Two New Yorkers | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Can two thin-crust loving New Yorkers make deep dish pizza fit for a Chicago native? As host Nicole Russell continues her quest to become the world's next master pizza maker she must face off against Josephine Giordano of Lenny's Pizza to see if she can conquer the Windy City's most controversial culinary export. Will Nicole's chicken parm-packed deep dish be enough to the win the favor of Muchies' Farideh Sadeghin and Chicago native Sean Evans?

programme.title: The Perfect Detroit-Style Pizza with Cliff Skighwalker, Adam Richman, and Reina Scully | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Detroit is home to some of America's most delicious pizza. But who can create the ultimate Motor City-inspired slice? As host Nicole Russell continues her quest to become the world's next master pizza-maker, she must face off against chef Cliff Skighwalker in a good ol' fashioned pan-pizza throwdown.

programme.title: Mythical Chef Josh and Nicole Russell Make Taco Bell and Beef Patty Inspired Pizzas | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Pizza is the ultimate blank canvas for culinary innovation. In this episode of Pizza Wars, host Nicole Russell faces off against Mythical Chef Josh to see who can create the ultimate "mashup pie." At Mythical Kitchen, Josh has perfected the art of fast-food fusion, but will his Doritos Locos Taco Pizza be enough to take down Nicole's Jamaican beef patty-inspired pie? The choice is up to this week's judges: Complex's Speedy Morman and chef Jae Lee of Nowon in NYC.

programme.title: Neapolitan-Style Pizza at Home with Vito Iacopelli, Nicole Russell, and Daym Drops | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: It's the season finale of Pizza Wars, and host Nicole Russell must now battle the final boss: master pizzaiolo Vito Iacopelli. Will Nicole's tandoori-inspired pizza be enough to impress food review legend Daym Drops, or will Vito's "connolo-style" slice steal the golden pizza trophy away from her for good? Only one oven can handle a pizza cage match of this magnitude: The Ooni Koda 16. Tune in to a very special episode of Pizza Wars to see who comes out on top.

programme.title: Maluma Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Global Colombian superstar Maluma goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Flight Club in Miami and talks about his love for the Nike Mags, meeting Virgil Abloh, and seeing his grandfather's appreciation for New Balance.

programme.title: Sean Evans Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Hot Ones host Sean Evans goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about his favorite sneakers growing up, getting his own Reebok collaboration, and some of his trademark sneakers.

programme.title: Roman Reigns Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: WWE superstar Roman Reigns goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Solefly in Miami and talks wearing Jordans in the ring, admiring Ken Griffey Jr. and having the best sneaker game in wrestling.

programme.title: Moneybagg Yo Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Moneybagg Yo goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about his mom working for Nike in Memphis, winning dice games to get money for sneakers, and his crazy sneaker collection.

programme.title: Soulja Boy Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Soulja Boy goes Sneaker Shopping at SoleStage in Los Angeles and talks about being the rapper who started the Bape trend, being the first rapper to wear Nike Mags, buying Kanye West's Louis Vuitton sneakers in Cancun, and how lucrative his Yums sneaker deal was.

programme.title: Pharrell Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Pharrell Williams goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at The Webster in Miami and talks about Nigo giving him Bape sneakers, why his Ice Cream sneakers were blurred out of the "Drop It Like It's Hot" video, his sneaker history, and Adidas collaborations, and more.

programme.title: The QueerX Awards
programme.desc: The circus is in town and just in time for National Coming Out Day! Welcome to the 2021 QueerX Awards brought to you by Lexus. Join us as hosts, Drew Droege and Raneir Pollard, take us on a carnival tour of LGBTQ music, films, and icons! Featuring appearances by Bowen Yang, Michaela Jaé Rodriguez, Patton Oswalt, Dwyane Wade, Erica Wheeler, and Elvira, Mistress of the Dark, Cassandra Peterson. And don't miss the special performances by Chanel and the Circus, Mila Jam, and Alsace Carcione.

programme.title: Room To Grow
programme.desc: S1 E5 | We interviewed Eden and Stacey at home and at their Synagogue. Eden gave us an informative interview on how ze lives life as a gender non-binary teenager. It was cute to zer 's mom still struggling with the pronouns, though trying so hard, she respects in every way how Eden identifies and supports zer fully. Stacey and Eden talked to us about being LGBTQ+ in Judaism as well.

programme.title: Strut
programme.desc: In each episode of Strut, we watch Eddie and her friends transform through their risky new endeavor in unexpected positive ways. Eddie is a geeky porn editor whose low self-confidence has turned her into a 26-year-old hermit. Her friends, Eva (an unemployed artist), Lucy (an intern), and Chandaleer (a trainwreck/fashion model) vow to save her from her unhealthy solitude. When the friends decide to start a high-end escorting agency to earn more money, they convince skeptical Eddie to help them build their business and lift her self-esteem. Together they successfully navigate the adrenaline-fueled escorting industry with Eddie as their CEO and fellow sex worker.

programme.title: Submission Possible
programme.desc: S1 E3 | In Episode Three, Young explores the quirky and kinky city of Portland, Oregon, a city full of people who stand up for what they believe in. Portland isn't afraid to remind us all that kink is political AF! From Strippers fighting for equal rights and pay amidst a pandemic to Foodie Activism for Sex Workers, Young connects with fellow sexual revolutionaries making a difference in their city. Madison's explorations lead them to an amazing cast of characters including Nikeisah C. Newton, a chef turned sex worker activist, Cat Hollis - a stripper rights activist and organizer for the Portland Stripper's Strike, Arabelle Raphael - sex worker and fetishist, and the donut daddy of our dreams, Dadi Iris, who shows us just what those donut holes are really for!

programme.title: Out On Stage

See OUT Magazine's "1 of the 10 comedians to watch in 2018," the comedian that Sarah Silverman calls, "So, SO, SO Funny" and 17 other top-rated Gay and Lesbian stand-up comedians discuss taboo subjects as only they can!

programme.title: Wild Animal
programme.desc: Wild Animal is Melanie Vesey's debut comedy special and album. programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Destruction! Terror! Mayhem! Sounds like the key ingredients to another hilarious edition of Britain's number 1 knockabout, foam-padded, obstacle-strewn game show Total Wipeout. Once again 20 foolish and fabulous contestants travel halfway across the globe to the purpose-built course in Buenos Aires.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: This episode welcomes a set of contestants to take on the wrath of some seriously hard obstacles in the hope of bagging the cash prize and the really rather cool trophy. They take on games called The Qualifier, the Double Cross, the Terror-Go-Round and The Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: This is the 'Last Chance Saloon' special's episode. Contestants take on four hard and tough games with the western films' sound effects and the accompaniment of Amanda Byram and Richard Hammond. They also welcome back favourites from the previous four series such as Man Mountain Syed, Rock God John and Total Wipeout's most famous couple 'Charlardo'.

programme.title: The Almost Impossible Gameshow
programme.desc: Comedy duo The Rubber Bandits provide anarchic commentary and their own twisted, surreal take on the action as the increasingly bedraggled contestants make their way through the show.

programme.title: The Almost Impossible Gameshow
programme.desc: The first episode of the game show in which 50 members of the public compete - with almost no chance of winning at all. Tonight's challenges include Tiny Bike, Dizzy Hurdle and Groin Croissant.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Richard Hammond dons his tuxedo for a special program honoring the heroes of Total Wipeout's fifth series. The presenter starts with the 'Best new obstacle award' and will be showing the top five, and the winner for each category. Don't miss out on this special episode because surely, it will make you have good laughs!

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: This is the first 'Celebrity Special' of the season. Today, Richard Hammond presents an extraordinary game show in which ten celebrities tackle one of television's most extreme obstacle courses to win 10,000 pounds for charity. Celebrities are Dalton Grant, Ricky Groves, Gail Emms, Charlie Stayt, Roxanne Pallett, Simon Day, Brian Belo, Camilla Dallerup, Nicola McLean and Julie Peasgood.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Time again for the world of celebrity to take on the world's most outrageous obstacle course in the name of charity, and in the name of slapstick entertainment! Richard Hammond and Amanda Byram watch the likes of Marcus Patric, Peter Duncan, Susie Amy, Chris Rankin, Donna Fraser, Clare Nasir, Neil Ruddock, Melissa Suffield, Lady Sovereign, and Dom try to make it to the Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: Gun Stories:OA-GNS-LC0801
programme.desc: Host Joe Mantena visits Sig Sauer whose very name immediately brings to mind a set of standards that are unmatched in the firearms world.

programme.title: Greg McHale's Wild Yukon:OA-GMH-LC1903
programme.desc: Mountain caribou country is some of the most beautiful the Yukon has to offer. A September hunt sees Greg and his former adventure racing teammate Travis working through the real challenges of remote mountain hunting.

programme.title: Pigman, The Series:OA-PIG-LC1104
programme.desc: It's Shankfest 5, and Group 1 is up to bat at the Choctaw Hunting Lodge in Oklahoma. So many pigs, so little time.

programme.title: Gun Stories:21st Century Pistol Designs
programme.desc: Joe Mantegna explores the surge of pistols based on the AR and AK platforms.

programme.title: Zona's Awesome Fishing Show:Phil Marks - Texas
programme.desc: Phil Marks is arguably one of the best anglers in the state of Texas and that is no small statement. When he and Z get together they morph into quite the team. Throw them on some summertime water in East Texas and they are going to do some damage.

programme.title: In-Fisherman TV:Roads Less Traveled
programme.desc: The In-Fisherman staff searches out out-of-the way and overlooked options for exciting fishing, as they travel to pits and ponds for bullheaded bluegills, use Euro tackle and tactics to catch bulldozer carp, and slip into high gear with over-the-top tactics for largemouth bass.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Best Boat:Ranger 2260 Bay, Grady 251 CE, Glasstream 360 SCX
programme.desc: Today, on Florida Sportsman Best Boat...If you are looking for a solid, well-designed fishing platform, that offers stylish and functional features, we will be taking a look at the Ranger 2260 Bay In search of a versatile boat that handles both inshore and offshore conditions with ease? If so, we will be taking a look at the Grady White 251 Coastal Explorer Looking for a FAST boat that delivers style, function and fishability? If so, we'll be taking a look at Glasstream 360 SCX.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Project Dreamboat:43 L&H Underway Classic 23 Seacraft Splash
programme.desc: L&H Boats begins production on hull number one of their brand new 43 George LaBonte joins John McCormick aboard his 1972 24 Pro-Line the experts at TRB tackle installing a very custom, one-off dash panel in the 25 Contender project and...finally complete...we meet with Cory Fountain, owner of the classic 23 Seacraft transformed at Wildfire Marine, for a day on the water in Savanna, Georgia.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Watermen:Crystal River Grouper Madness with Capt Dan Clymer
programme.desc: Crystal River is known for its beautiful spring fed river systems with an old Florida feeling. What Capt Sam Atwell finds out is they also have an incredible shallow water Grouper fishery.

programme.title: Greg McHale's Wild Yukon:You Wanted and Adventure: Dall's Sheep Part 2
programme.desc: The pinnacle of Yukon mountain hunting is the Dall's Sheep. Greg flies himself into a remote corner of unroaded country to find a big ram. Northern weather is unforgiving and a thick blanket of fresh snow welcomes Greg on this August hunt. Tough weather conditions and sparse sheep make this a hunt for the books. In Part 2 of this double episode, Greg finally finds the hidden corner of the range holding rams.

programme.title: Pigman: The Series:Back In The Outback Part 1
programme.desc: Pigman heads back to Australia for some Scrubbers and Hogs with Collar the Dogs. This time he's taking his Inner Circle crew to show them what the wild outback is all about.

programme.title: The Reluctant Outdoorsman:The Reluctant Gar Fisherman
programme.desc: Derek goes to Texas in search of the prehistoric looking alligator gar. Featuring Kirk Kirkland.

programme.title: Into the Blue S13:E3 "Wrecks of Hawks Cay"
programme.desc: The near shore wrecks of Hawks Cay is the place to be when the wind is blowing.

programme.title: Into the Blue S13:E4 "Key West Yellowtailin"
programme.desc: Targeting Yellowtail Snapper in Key West is the perfect way to start any trip.

programme.title: Local Knowledge S6:E3 "If This Boat Could Talk"
programme.desc: Ali and Rush head to Guatemala to fish with David Salazar at Casa Vieja Lodge aboard the latest addition to the fleet. If this boat could talk, the tales of record breaking fish and world travels would be endless and Dave’s big plans for it are sure to make for an exciting new chapter.

programme.title: Local Knowledge S6:E4 "Gulffish”
programme.desc: The boys are back in the Florida Keys fishing with Capt. Tony Murphy from the Saltwater Angler tackle shop in Key West aboard his 32’ SeaVee. Tony takes the boys into the Gulf of Mexico to chase Permit on wrecks using live crabs for bait. The Gulf doesn’t disappoint and also provides plenty of action from other Florida Keys species.

programme.title: Local Knowledge S6:E5 "The Slow Pitch"
programme.desc: With slow pitch jigging being the newest craze, Rush and buddy Dane head out to test some new tackle and go for “mutton or nothing.” Meanwhile in California, Ali gets his hand on the new gear and prepares to hop a flight and join in on the “slow pitch” party with the guys in Key West.

programme.title: Fly Rod Chronicles S17:E3 "Fly Fishing for a Cure"
programme.desc: Curtis teams up with legendary NCAA head coach Bob Huggins for the 7th annual Fish Fry to raise money for his two foundations the Norma May Huggins Foundation and Remember the Miners that gives scholarships to kids that lost there loved ones in mining accidents. The event is held at the beautiful Harman's Cabins in West Virginia.

programme.title: Fly Rod Chronicles S17:E4 "Cuba Bones"
programme.desc: Curtis returns to Cuba to fish with Avalon Fishing Companion on the pursuit of chasing monster Bonefish. He also takes his good friend Rick Heim to chase permit, but the size of the Bonefish keeps him occupied.

programme.title: Sweetwater S6:E1 "Our Pal Buddy"
programme.desc: The Sweetwater guys are joined by professional bass angler and Tennessee Valley guru Buddy Gross.

programme.title: Sweetwater S6:E2 "Fishin' Friends and Family"
programme.desc: Miles & Joey take Joey's kids out for a fun day of bobber fishing for crappie.

programme.title: Breaking Point S7:E1 "First Fuzz"
programme.desc: The 2019 archery deer season would once again begin for us in the state of North Dakota. With an early opener, it offers us the opportunity to chase early season bucks before they shed their velvet. The crew settles into camp “Dinkota” and it didn’t take long for Aaron “JP” to break the ice and get the 2019 party started.

programme.title: Breaking Point S7:E2 "Round 2"
programme.desc: The spot and stalk archery hunting has quickly become an addiction for the crew. After a successful trip in 2018, Mike heads back to western North Dakota for another round of chasing Mule Deer. It would take a few days, and a couple close calls before a golden opportunity presented itself on a velvet mule deer.

programme.title: Breaking Point: S7:E3 "Double Down"
programme.desc: Brennen and Mike were riding a “high” as they traveled from western North Dakota back to “Dinkota” to chase whitetails. With a massive early season cold front opportunity, Dylan and JP packed up in Wisconsin to meet them at camp. Brennen and Dylan were in the hot seat this trip as Mike and JP had already notched their tags in the state. Anticipation was high, and for good reason. As the sun began to fall, Dylan would strike first and less than 20 miles away, Brennen would send an arrow to complete the double.

programme.title: Reel West Coast S2:E1 Only at Joe's
programme.desc: Brendan heads up to Joe’s Salmon Lodge where he does some old school cut plug fishing for monster salmon in the beautiful Central Coast of BC.

programme.title: Reel West Coast S2:E2 Fraser River Future
programme.desc: Brendan and Fred Helmer from Fred’s Custom Tackle go for the mighty sturgeon on the world famous Fraser River. They work together in order to tag and help conserve this amazing species.

programme.title: Reel West Coast S2:E3 Port Hardy Hogs
programme.desc: Brendan and his friend Walt go hunting for big Chinook Salmon in Port Hardy BC with Chad’s Coastwide Sports Fishing.

programme.title: The Raven Project Hanging Stands
programme.desc: Randy takes you through step by step on hanging a stand in one of his favorite plots to hunt on the Raven.

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E1 "Raven Show One Alpha"
programme.desc: From the ground up host Randy Birdsong will take you through the trials and tribulations of owning his first farm and grooming it to be one of the best whitetail hunting properties in the country

programme.title: Wired Outdoors S13:E12 "Nurse Crops For Food Plots and Big Buck Success"
programme.desc: Jason describes in detail how and why to plant nurse crops for whitetail food plots and the success he had with one of his biggest bucks.

programme.title: Wired Outdoors S13:E13 "Impact – Liquid Food Plot Boost!"
programme.desc: Jason takes you through his experiences with the new liquid soil amendment product from Whitetail Institute called Impact! Create high yielding nutritious food plots in areas where bulk or pellet lime is not an option.

programme.title: Wired Outdoors S13:E14 "Amazing No Plow Food Plots"
programme.desc: See one of our very favorite food plot seed blends, No Plow from Whitetail Institute. We love it and more importantly, so do the deer!

programme.title: Wired Outdoors S13:E11 "Turkey Hunting In Elk Country"
programme.desc: Jon Collins and his brother Phil are turkey hunting public land in Wyoming. Watch as they call in two Merriam’s gobblers!

programme.title: Wired Outdoors S13:E9 "Opening Day PA Turkey Hunting"
programme.desc: See field staffer Brock take a great PA longbeard on the opening day of the PA Youth Turkey Season.

programme.desc: After a shift in the wind direction, everyone settles into new locations. The highly anticipated opening day does not disappoint, though. Chipper Jones makes the right move and gets rewarded when a beautiful 10-pointer (that's fresh out of velvet) gets up and walks his way.

programme.title: Old-Fashioned Birthday Cake
programme.desc: In this episode, we aim to resurrect the traditional birthday cake. No tiramisù takeoffs or cupcake shortcuts need apply. We've developed an honest-to-goodness layer cake with an old-fashioned jam filling and real butter frosting-the type of cake guaranteed to put a smile on anyone's face.

programme.title: Fish and Chips at Home
programme.desc: The problem with English-style fish and chips is that you've got to hop a plane across the Atlantic to enjoy the most authentic version. We wanted to be able to serve English-style fish and chips-large pieces of moist and delicate cod in a crisp and tender coating with thick-cut fries-at home.

programme.title: Chicken Kiev
programme.desc: Commonly found in banquet halls and at catered events, this once-highbrow dish has become a bit of a joke. But after preparing several cookbook versions, we realized that pairing a crisp-fried coating with a delicately flavored butter sauce was a great idea that deserved a revival.

programme.title: Holiday Feast
programme.desc: Test cook Ashley Moore shows host Bridget Lancaster how to make a Crumb-Crusted Rack of Lamb that is perfect for the holidays. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Julia Collin Davison his top picks of electric knives. Finally, test cook Christie Morrison shows Julia how to make a showstopping Brussels Sprout Gratin.

programme.title: Fish Tacos and Steak Fajitas
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof and host Bridget Lancaster prepare a Southern California classic, Smoked Fish Tacos. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Julia Collin Davison his top pick of chimney starters. Finally, test cook Christie Morrison makes Julia Grilled Steak Fajitas.

programme.title: BBQ Thighs and Fried Peach Pies
programme.desc: Julia Collin Davison unveils the secrets to the ultimate Barbecue Chicken Thighs to host, Bridget Lancaster. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of popcorn. And finally, test cook Bryan Roof demonstrates how to make Fried Peach Pies at home.

programme.title: Pork and Pierogi
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster prepare a show-stopping special occasion Cider-Braised Pork Roast. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a sauerkraut tasting. Finally, test cook Bryan Roof teaches host Julia Collin Davison the secrets to tackling authentic Pittsburgh-style Potato-Cheddar Pierogi at home.

programme.title: Tristate Treats
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster make the ultimate New Jersey Crumb Buns. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews nonstick skillets. And finally, test cook Lan Lam makes Julia a streamlined recipe for Cheese Blintzes with Raspberry Sauce.

programme.title: Spaghetti House Classics
programme.desc: Test cook Christie Morrison makes host Julia Collin Davison the perfect Hearty Beef Lasagna. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a tasting of block mozzarella. And finally, test cook Lan Lam makes Bridget a new weeknight favorite-Chicken Scarpariello.

programme.title: Beef Stir-Fry and Scallion Pancakes
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster goes into the test kitchen with host Julia Collin Davison to learn how to make Beef Stir-Fry with Bell Peppers and Black Pepper Sauce. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of soy sauce. Next, test cook Keith Dresser shows Julia how to make Scallion Pancakes with Dipping Sauce.

programme.title: Autumn Desserts
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster goes into the test kitchen with host Julia Collin Davison to learn how to make the ultimate Chewy Oatmeal Cookies. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews mini prep bowls in the Equipment Corner. Finally, test cook Elle Simone reveals the secrets to Ultranutty Pecan Bars.

programme.title: To Meat or Not to Meat (Sauce)
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison uncover the secrets to making a weeknight-friendly recipe for Tagliatelle with Bolognese Sauce. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of crushed tomatoes. Next, science expert Dan Souza explains the surprising science behind why you can't overcook mushrooms. Finally, test cook Becky Hays makes Julia the ultimate Meatless "Meat" Sauce.

programme.title: Japanese Suppers
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster prepare Japanese-style pan-fried chicken cutlets. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for santoku knives. Finally, test cook Keith Dresser makes Bridget miso-marinated salmon.

programme.title: Updated Italian
programme.desc: Test cook Keith Dresser makes Bridget an updated recipe for an Italian staple: Chicken Piccata. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Julia to a tasting of unsalted butter, and science expert Dan Souza explains the science behind fat and temperature perception. Finally, Bridget and Julia unlock the secrets to making the ultimate Chocolate Semifreddo.

programme.title: Pork Chops and Oven Fries
programme.desc: In this episode, test cook Elle Simone makes Bridget the ultimate Deviled Pork Chops. Then tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Julia to a tasting of dark chocolate chips, and gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews kids' oven mitts. Science expert Dan Souza reveals the science behind non-Newtonian fluids, and test cook Lan Lam makes the perfect Thick-Cut Oven Fries.

programme.title: Fried Rice and Kung Pao Shrimp
programme.desc: We show you how to prepare fried rice and kung pao shrimp. Our findings about rice cookers and long-grain white rice guarantee perfect rice every time.

programme.title: Hearty Soups
programme.desc: On a cold day, few dishes are as comforting as a hearty soup-unless it turns out starchy or gluey. Watch as we make thick and creamy versions of two of our favorites: ham and split pea, and rustic potato-leek.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - Disappearing Act
programme.desc: The collapse of our Bee population is a crisis that could affect a third of the plants we eat and depend on. Beekeeper Dave Hackenberg takes Chef David Guas inside the hives to find out what is happening to our pollinator populations. In a picturesque Pennsylvania orchard, the chef and beekeeper watch the bees buzz, discussing ways in which these important creatures might be saved.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Bean Chronicles
programme.desc: The variety of bean-based dishes in Korean cuisine is a testament to Korea’s ingenuity and resourcefulness. On The Bean Chronicles, Marja travels to Chodang to see artisinal tofu get made the old-fashioned way with fresh soybeans and ocean water and then enjoys a four course tofu meal with fresh tofu, each preparation completely distinct and delicious enough to convince any tofu nay-sayer.

programme.title: Great Chefs of America: Anoosh Shariat, Richard Chamberlain, and Doyle DeForest
programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Portobello Napoleon, Peppered Beef Tenderloin, and Sacher Truffle Torte. Restaurants include: Shariat’s in Louisville, Chamberlain’s Chop House in Dallas, and Flour Power in New Orleans.

programme.title: Superfoods with Chef Walter Staib - Avocado
programme.desc: More than a Dip, explore Avocado Gazpacho, Pacific Rim Salad, Crab Salad and Avocado Corn Relish.

programme.title: Martin Yan - Quick and Easy - Teahouse Delights
programme.desc: Martin visits a traditional Asian teahouse and learns about the delicacies they serve. Back in his studio kitchen, Martin puts his new-found knowledge to work and cooks these quick and easy dishes.

programme.title: Martin Yan's Chinatowns - Everyday to Elegant
programme.desc: Martin tries traditional Chinese cuisine in Melbourne, from the quick and inexpensive to dishes with a very elegant flair. This episode's recipes include: Chinese Doughnuts, Shrimp and Scallops with Chinese Doughnuts, and Flower Drum Crab Baked in the Shell.

programme.title: Dine & Dish Nation - The Best of Dine & Dish Nation #2
programme.desc: Host Kam Carman welcomes Barbara Johnson, Jarod Robert and Elizabeth Kraft, who review Mexican and Italian specialties a la Chef Norberto Garita at El Barzon, and after Shanda Golden, Kevin Janeway and Dominique Bush review the fare at Royale With Cheese, a funky burger joint inspired by the movie, "Pulp Fiction," Barbara, Jarod and Elizabeth review steaks and seafood at the Rattlesnake Club.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - Oregon Organics
programme.desc: We meet a paraplegic farmer who has little patience for sympathy, but a big heart for earth friendly produce. Chef Philippe Boulot is grateful for the impeccable ingredients Gilmer grows. The farmer, chef, and daughter roll through the fields selecting ingredients for one of Portland’s best restaurants. Chef Boulot shows off his cuisine with daughter‐ and favorite sou-chef, as apprentice.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Seafood Chronicles
programme.desc: iving into one of the most amazing Korean traditions, Jean-Georges visits with the haenyos of Jeju Island, true mermaids who free-dive for seafood off the rocky coast. Jean-Georges feasts on fresher-than-fresh sea urchin, a dream breakfast for a world-renowned chef. Then he enjoys a fortifying seafood stew at Baekrok Haegwon restaurant.

programme.title: Great Chefs of America: Thomas Catherall, Paul Milne, and Norman Love
programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Crabmeat Caesar Salad, Sauteed Venison, and Almond Experience. Restaurants include: Tom Tom in Atlanta, 208 Talbot St. Michael’s, and The Ritz-Carlton in Naples.

programme.title: Superfoods with Chef Walter Staib - Turkey
programme.desc: Go beyond the holiday table with Turkey Roulade and Mashed Sweet Potatoes, Lemongrass-Ginger Turkey Kabobs and Turkey Guacamole Wraps.

programme.title: Martin Yan - Quick and Easy - Chiufin Specialties
programme.desc: A visit to the markets of Chiufin in northern Taiwan, can inspire any chef, especially Martin. So using his experience as his inspiration, Martin shows us how to make this quick and easy meal.

programme.title: Martin Yan's Chinatowns - Street Dining to Fine Dining
programme.desc: Martin and Chef Chen sample the best of everything from Haute Cuisine to simple street fare in Singapore. This episode's recipes include: Steamed King Prawns with Cilantro Pesto, Crispy Seafood and Mango Packets, and White Cloud Wok-Seared Scallops.

programme.title: Dine & Dish Nation - The Best of Dine & Dish Nation #1
programme.desc: Host Kam Carman welcomes Pierre Binandeh, Tracie Ginster, and Marcel Sanders, who review signature dishes from the Grey Ghost Steakhouse and sumptuous soups and hearty sandwiches at the Russell Street Deli also Chris Guyor, Nailah Ellis-Brown and Niki Calme, who review sophisticated specialties at the Prime & Proper Steakhouse.

programme.title: Graham Kerr's Kitchen - Whole Grain Island on a Parsnip Sea
Hawaii Cooks with Roy Yamaguchi - Chinese New Year
programme.desc: Kung Hee Fat Choy! Hawaii Cooks celebrates Chinese New Year with a trip into Chinatown and examines the delicious food and festivities that mark this holiday. Guest chef and Chinese restaurateur, Leeann Chin, joins Roy in the kitchen to prepare a traditional shrimp and tofu dish while discussing the significance of food and this auspicious celebration in Chinese culture.

programme.title: Justin Wilson's Easy Cookin' - Seven Steak Etoufee & Wild Rice
programme.desc: Join Justin as he demonstrates how to prepare and cook Seven Steak Etoufee & Wild Rice!

programme.title: Journy World Docs - Easter Island: Mysteries of a Lost World
programme.desc: The contrast between the majestic statues of Easter Island and the desolation of their surroundings is stark. For decades, Easter Island has been seen as a warning for the planet as a whole: exhaust natural resources and the collapse of civilisation is inevitable. But Dr Jago Cooper believes that this is a disastrous misreading of what happened on Easter Island. Far from being a failure, the culture was a success story - and the real reasons for its demise were not the actions of its people.

programme.title: Journy World Docs - Joanna Lumley: In the Land of the Northern Lights
programme.desc: An amazing journey in Norway's Far North as Joanna Lumley pursues a life-long dream to track down the elusive, stunningly beautiful Northern Lights - 'the true wonder of the world' as she puts it.

programme.title: Lost Kingdoms of Africa - The Kingdom of Asante
programme.desc: Asante in West Africa was a kingdom that was built on gold and slaves, which ensured its important place in an economy that linked three continents.

programme.title: Lost Kingdoms of Africa - The Zulu Kingdom
programme.desc: In South Africa, Gus Casely-Hayford visits evocative sites in Zulu history and searches for the secrets behind the Zulu's cultural power and military strength.

programme.title: Lost Kingdoms of Africa - The Berber Kingdom of Morocco
programme.desc: Gus Casely-Hayford visits Morocco, once the centre of a vast kingdom created by African Berbers that stretched from northern Spain to West Africa.

programme.title: Refugee Chef - Afghan at Last
programme.desc: For 28 years, Javad Ghaderi kept his Afghan nationality a secret. He was an asylum seeker for all of those years, and endured deportation 3 times. It was food that helped him at critical junctions, and now he is using Persian cuisine to solidify new friendships with locals in Wollongong, Australia.
