programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: In this iconic scene, Chief Brody hangs on to his sinking boat as a giant shark approaches him with a scuba tank lodged in its mouth. programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?

programme.desc: A family stranded in the California desert when their RV breaks down find themselves at the mercy of a group of monstrous cannibals.

programme.title: Blood and Black Lace
programme.desc: A fashion model's murder sets off a chain reaction of terror and suspicion among her coworkers, who fear what she may have written in a recently discovered diary as more murders turn a sleek glamor palace into the stomping grounds for a lunatic in director Mario Bava's horror masterpiece.

programme.title: Theatre Macabre EP23 - Resurrection of the Offland
programme.desc: Christopher Lee hosts this anthology series adapted from stories by Poe, Dostoevsky, Robert Louis Stevenson and Oscar Wilde.

programme.title: Chopping Mall
programme.desc: Eight teenagers are trapped after hours in a high-tech shopping mall and pursued by murderous security robots out of control.

programme.title: Horror Express
programme.desc: An anthropologist boards the Trans-Siberian Express with the frozen remains of a primitive humanoid that's not dead!

programme.title: Invasion of Blood Farmers
programme.desc: Somewhere in upstate New York, a secretive group of farmers are harvesting human blood for a mysterious purpose.

programme.title: War of the God Monsters
programme.desc: When gigantic creatures start to appear in South Korea a doctor and journalist must find a way to save themselves, and the world.

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: When an ancient Egyptian artifact is discovered, two men unlock its secret power as a portal through time and space.

programme.title: Stargate: The Ark of Truth
programme.desc: An ancient artifact know as the "Ark" will play a key role in the ongoing fight between good and evil, and SG-1 is on the hunt for it. When the SG-1 crew discovers that a final assault on Earth is in the works and a double-agent is scheming among them, their mission takes on a new and urgent meaning as they travel to the Wraith's home turf to overtake their arch enemy before it's too late.

programme.title: Stargate: Continuum
programme.desc: In this adrenaline-driven, action adventure, members of SG-1 find themselves returning to a world where their history has been drama tically altered and the Stargate program never existed! Continuing the legacy of "Stargate SG-1," "Stargate: Continuum" reunites Richard Dean Anderson as Jack O'Neill, with series favorites Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Golden Globe® winner and three-time Emmy Award®-winning actor, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks as Daniel Jackson.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century: Smuggle out millions of dollars in worn-out currency headed for a Federal Reserve shredder every day.

programme.title: Armstrong
programme.desc: During her first night on the job, a rookie EMT and her partner pick up a wounded superhero and are pulled into his mission to save Los Angeles from a sinister organization.

programme.title: In Harms Way
programme.desc: Producer-director Otto Preminger’s epic treatment of the bombing of Pearl Harbor details the devastating attack on the Hawaiian naval base as well as the explosive, behind-the-scenes stories.

programme.title: The Fighting Seabees
programme.desc: The construction foreman of a fighting work battalion to be stationed near Japanese lines in the Pacific and a naval commander colleague compete in Washington for a journalist, while preparing to engage the enemy in a massive assault.

programme.title: Flying Tigers
programme.desc: John Wayne adds luster to this early WWII film about the famous P-40 Flying Group who soared into battle against the Japanese in defense of China's freedom, Great dogfight scenes!

programme.title: Stalag 17
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: Sweet Nothing in My Ear
programme.desc: Dan and Laura Miller have been married for several years, but their relationship begins to change when their only son, Adam, loses his hearing at the age of four.

programme.title: The Piano Lesson
programme.desc: A family is torn by the choice of keeping a valuable family heirloom piano or selling it to improve their lives. Stars Charles S. Dutton, Alfre Woodard and Courtney B. Vance. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: The Mystery Cruise
programme.desc: Alvirah, Regan and their husbands join a murder mystery cruise. But, when Alvirah sees a real murder attempt, she and Regan must find a way to keep the intended victim safe while trying to find proof to expose the murderer.

programme.title: Brush With Fate
programme.desc: A teacher regales a new colleague with tales of a Vermeer painting's impact on the lives of its past and present owners. Stars Glenn Close, Ellen Burstyn.

programme.title: The Town Christmas Forgot
programme.desc: An upscale, urban family that can't seem to get along gets stranded in a remote, impoverished lumber town two days before Christmas. Stars Lauren Holly and Rick Roberts.

programme.title: Back When We Were Grown Ups
programme.desc: Based on Anne Tyler's novel, the movie centers on Rebecca Davitch, a 53-year-old single mother and grandmother, and the cast of her colorful family around her. Stars Blythe Danner.

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft with no idea who they are, and discover they're not alone.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: After being unmasked during a heist, an infiltration expert finds herself mixed up in a conspiracy.

programme.title: Officer Down
programme.desc: A rogue police officer seeks revenge against the men responsible for a string of attacks on a local strip club

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft with no idea who they are, and discover they're not alone.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: After being unmasked during a heist, an infiltration expert finds herself mixed up in a conspiracy.

programme.title: Danika
programme.desc: With the belief that she is going insane, Danika (Marisa Tomei, "My Cousin Vinny"), seeks psychiatric help. But what happens when her gruesome hallucinations start becoming a reality?

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: At a high school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

programme.title: All Summers End
programme.desc: Peer-pressured by his two best friends to prove they're more important than a girl, Conrad Stevens pulls an innocent prank that has a disastrous impact on the family life of his girlfriend, Grace Turner. Racked with guilt, Conrad tries to make up for his mistake by doing everything he can for Grace - except tell the truth. What began as innocent summer love suddenly transforms into something more real than either could have expected.

programme.title: Regresa
programme.desc: A woman in Mexico City has marital problems and goes to a therapist. She wakes up from hypnosis thinking she's a Basque princess from the 15th century. English Subtitled.

programme.title: Stonehearst Asylum
programme.desc: An Oxford grad (Jim Sturgess, "Across the Universe") accepts a job at a mental asylum and soon discovers that its "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane and horrific.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: In this tense apocalyptic thriller, five youths fight to survive after being stranded in Moscow during an alien attack.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: After a car crash, a woman wakes up in a survivalist’s bunker. He claims to have saved her from an apocalyptic attack but, growing suspicious of his motives, she'll have to escape to discover the truth.

programme.title: The Covenant
programme.desc: To the students of the Spenser Academy, the Sons of Ipswich are the baddest boys on campus. But that's not all they share. The four friends also share a 300-year-old secret: they're warlocks, the teenage descendants of a 17th-century coven of witches.

programme.title: The Monster Squad
programme.desc: Young kids form a club that is devoted to monsters, but soon get more than they bargained for when Dracula adjourns to Earth, with Frankenstein's Monster, Wolfman, Mummy, and the Gillman.

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a plague of bizarre, puzzling murders grip London, young Holmes and his new found friend Watson find themselves unwittingly entangled in the dark mystery.

programme.title: Faces in the Crowd
programme.desc: A woman with "face-blindness" is unable to identify a serial killer after surviving an attack.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery
programme.desc: A street-wise man (Freddie Prinze Jr.) gets mixed up in a scheme involving a pool shark (Ving Rhames) and a crooked lawman.

programme.title: Sacrifice
programme.desc: A undercover cop inadvertently gets involved in a heroin ring when a young defector of the drug trade leaves his 5-year-old sister in his care. Starring Cuba Gooding Jr. and Christian Slater.

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: In 1999, Officer Dave Brown (Woody Harrelson), a 24-year veteran of the Los Angeles Police Department, tends to follow his own code of rough justice. A number of years earlier, he was implicated in the death of a serial rapist. Brown's violent tendencies once again land him in hot water when a video of him beating up a suspect plays all over local TV. An assistant DA (Sigourney Weaver) pressures him to retire, but Brown edges closer and closer to a meltdown.

programme.title: Blunt Force Trauma
programme.desc: In the seedy underground dueling culture of South America, two opponents wearing Kevlar vests face each other, draw and shoot. With Mickey Rourke.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Jason Statham stars as a tough cop who's dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers. Also featuring Paddy Considine and Aidan Gillen.

programme.title: Let Go & Let God
programme.desc: Let Go and Let God follows two people from vastly different worlds whose lives are rocked after experiencing sudden deaths in their family. They question God as a result, but find the faith they're looking for on an unexpected path.

programme.title: The Green Grass
programme.desc: When money, success, and power becomes your platform it undoubtedly attracts an audience of onlookers some of who will stop at nothing to get a taste of the good life. But as the plot thickens and the heat intensifies, Shawn's credibility will most certainly be challenged. He'll need to dig deep within himself to stop his life from spinning wildly out of control. This thrilling drama will test his limits as he struggles to find the balance between who he is and who he imagines himself to be. And in the aftermath he'll count up the cost of The Green Grass.

programme.title: Great Gains
programme.desc: Isaac is a janitor whose livelihood is in jeopardy when his boss tries to cut his job in order to save money. When it seems he has finally gotten the best of Isaac, a misunderstanding at a convenience store puts a winning lottery ticket in Isaac's hands. Isaac purchases the company in attempts to get back at Henry for the troubles he caused at work. Isaac's world has been turned around but after gaining so much he may be on the edge of losing it all.

programme.title: The BAM: The Willie Johnson Story
programme.desc: The gripping story of how martial arts transformed a criminal into a 7-time World Champion, a community leader and a real man. Willie Johnson tells his story through his own words, from the highs to the lows, and how he has triumphed over it all.

programme.title: The Perfect Prayer
programme.desc: Serenity Scott endures the unthinkable act of both mental and physical abuse from her parents. Parents are supposed to be the ones that kids trust with their life. Moms and dads should be the hero's that make the bad guys disappear and help their children escape the monsters in their dreams. This was not Serenity's case instead her dreams were her reality. Her trust was trampled by her mom Jamie and her heart was broken by her father Kenneth. Serenity loses her faith in God and now she is in search for The Perfect Prayer.

programme.title: Pandemic, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Tiffani Thiessen, French Stewart, Faye Dunaway, Eric Roberts, Vincent Spano, Bob Gunton, Michael Massee When inexplicable flu-like symptoms kill a young man aboard an airliner en route to Los Angeles from Australia, Dr. Kayla Martin, head of the Center for Disease Control, orders the quarantine of all the passengers. But the deadly strain of this unknown virus is already spreading, and so is the panic. And now it’s a race against the clock, and across the globe, to find a cure.

programme.title: Ambulance Girl
programme.desc: Kathy Bates, Michael Bach, David Michie, Robin Thomas, Nathalie Toriel, Gordon Pinsent, Kristina Nicoll The true story of food writer Jane Stern who overcame her depression and paralyzing phobias by becoming a volunteer emergency medical technician.

programme.title: Gambler V: Playing For Keeps: Night 1
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers, Loni Anderson, Mariska Hargitay Brady Hawkes has to run to his son's rescue once again in this continuation of the Gambler stories. Jeremiah is now a young man who has become involved with Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Brady pursues the gang in order to get Jeremiah out of the gang before he gets in too much trouble with the law.

programme.title: Gambler V: Playing For Keeps: Night 2
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers, Loni Anderson, Mariska Hargitay Brady Hawkes has to run to his son's rescue once again in this continuation of the Gambler stories. Jeremiah is now a young man who has become involved with Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Brady pursues the gang in order to get Jeremiah out of the gang before he gets in too much trouble with the law.

programme.title: The Baron And The Kid
programme.desc: Johnny Cash, Greg Webb, Tracy Pollan William “The Baron” Addington (Johnny Cash) is a former pool pro whose lifetime of boozing has cost him his career and family. In an attempt to straighten out his life, he quits drinking and plays pool only for charity.

programme.title: Hearing is Believing
programme.desc: 'Hearing Is Believing' introduces the world to the young musician & composer Rachel Flowers. Born premature, she soon lost her eyesight but had perfect pitch. The film illuminates the bonds of family and the divine mysteries of creativity.

programme.title: UFO Chronicles: Masters of Deception
programme.desc: experts reveal insights into the UFO enigma and the Alien Presence on earth exploring the role of global corporations and the one world government movement and how it influences the cover-up of the UFO phenomenon today.

programme.title: Free in Deed
programme.desc: Set in the provocative world of storefront churches where a single mother brings her son to a lonely minister for healing -- he must confront the incurable illness of a child while also battling his inescapable demons.

programme.title: Kim Swims
programme.desc: The inspiring story of an accomplished open water swimmer's attempt to become the first woman to swim 30 miles through a stretch of cold, rough and shark-inhabited waters near the San Francisco coast.

programme.title: Skyman
programme.desc: Carl Merryweather claims he was visited by an alien as child when out camping the desert with his father. Now, thirty years later, he's convinced that same alien is returning for a reunion.

programme.title: The Principal
programme.desc: At the toughest high school in town, the biggest troublemaker is the principal. Edited for TV

programme.title: No Small Affair
programme.desc: A teenager falls for an "older woman" and wages an all-out campaign to boost her career and win her heart. Edited for TV

programme.title: Wholly Moses
programme.desc: Tourists in Israel find an old scroll, the Book of Herschel, about a false savior upstaged by Moses.

programme.title: A Fine Mess
programme.desc: A slapstick action and goodtime comedy as an actor and a carhop go the races and get caught in a chase.

programme.title: Nobody's Perfekt
programme.desc: Three slightly disturbed psychiatric patients decide to take on the government.

programme.title: Up The Macgregors
programme.desc: When a bandit gang steals their gold and kidnaps their women, two Texas clans band together to get them back.

programme.title: The Man From Colorado
programme.desc: A sadistic judge's lust for blood puts him at odds with his best friend in post-Civil War Colorado.

programme.title: Smoky Canyon
programme.desc: The Durango Kid comes to the rescue of some Montana cattle owners and sheepherders after a feud breaks out between the two factions. When a member of Coffin's gang kills a rancher, the dead man's daughter and her fiance get in trouble with the law that is, until Starrett clears their names.

programme.title: 40 Guns To Apache Pass
programme.desc: A heroic cavalry captain singlehandedly puts down a massive Apache rebellion, led by Cochise, soon after the Civil War.

programme.title: Montana Territory
programme.desc: An idealistic deputy is disillusioned to learn that a sheriff he idolizes is using his badge as a cover for his crimes.

programme.title: Ten Wanted Men
programme.desc: A noble cattleman battles an embittered, rival rancher, who hires ten outlaws to seize power in the territory.

programme.title: Red River
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: Goin South
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson plays Henry Moon, a third-rate outlaw, in this romantic comedy set in the 1860s.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Mattie, a young lady living in a mining camp of the Southwest, unwittingly marries a claim jumper despite the fact she is in love with a gold miner. Soon, the Old West brings her death, confusion, and the hard reality of her claim jumping husband.

programme.title: The Long Riders
programme.desc: Four theatrical families of the 1980s re-create the saga of the 1860s James Gang: Stacy and James Keach, David, Keith and Robert Carradine, Randy and Dennis Quaid and Christopher and Nicholas Guest.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: A robbery starts a series of events that lead Johnny Ringo to kidnap Judge Spicer to release his cousin Charlie Parks from jail.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: After Wells Fargo is robbed and an agent killed, Thacker pressures Earp to capture the killers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After a young stablehand kills a notorious gunslinger, he is baffled by the hostility of the townspeople about giving him the reward.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a horse dealer transporting a prize stallion stops in North Fork, two saddle tramps try to use trickery to obtain it.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An elderly couple moves to North Fork under an assumed name to hide the fact that they are the parents of a vicious killer. The plan backfires when the son shows up at their home.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After foiling a girl's attempt to rob the general store, Lucas finds that she and her brother are plotting the murder of their abusive stepfather.

programme.desc: Mark discovers that the new preacher and his wife are impostors planning a robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Marshall Torrance get into trouble with the Army when they try to help a wounded young soldier who deserted.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Mark contracts typhoid fever and has a vision of his dead mother he no longer seems interested in getting well.

programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas's returns to town in the company of a shady gambler and is accused of cheating at cards.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas receives a series of mysterious threatening notes from an ex-convict with a grudge.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.desc: A sharecropper enters his colt in a horse race hoping to win enough money to buy his farm from the owner who has bet on Mark McCain's entry.

programme.desc: Lucas helps his former Army captain, now an undercover federal agent, infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.
